movies.Title: Pulp Fiction
movies.Writer: Quentin Tarantino (story), Roger Avary (story), Quentin Tarantino
movies.Actors: Tim Roth, Amanda Plummer, Laura Lovelace, John Travolta
movies.Plot: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.Title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
movies.Writer: Luciano Vincenzoni (story), Sergio Leone (story), Agenore Incrocci (screenplay), Furio Scarpelli (screenplay), Luciano Vincenzoni (screenplay), Sergio Leone (screenplay), Mickey Knox (English version by)
movies.Actors: Eli Wallach, Clint Eastwood, Lee Van Cleef, Aldo Giuffr√®
movies.Plot: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

movies.Title: Schindler's List
movies.Actors: Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley, Ralph Fiennes, Caroline Goodall
movies.Plot: In Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

movies.Title: 12 Angry Men
movies.Actors: Martin Balsam, John Fiedler, Lee J. Cobb, E.G. Marshall
movies.Plot: A dissenting juror in a murder trial slowly manages to convince the others that the case is not as obviously clear as it seemed in court.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 16 wins & 6 nominations.
